remarks: Value of the principal Dirichlet character.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchr1.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchr1.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchr1.o $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchr1.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchr1.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dchr1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. U ) $.
dchr1 $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` A ) = 1 ) $.
